about_the_game:
Welcome to Cumtown – A Fantasy Adventure Like No Other!

Step into the world of Cumtown, a steamy, interactive visual novel set in a fantasy universe where adventure meets desire. Follow the journey of Dylan, an experienced adventurer known for completing daring tasks for gold. Together with his trusted and battle-hardened friend Ellie, they arrive in the mysterious city of Cumtown, where rumors of high rewards have lured them.

But things aren't as they seem…

Upon arriving, Dylan and Ellie discover that Cumtown is under the grip of a powerful curse—a spell that ignites unrestrained passion in its citizens, driving them to unquenchable lust. Now, Dylan must navigate this strange new world, fulfilling tasks that not only offer monetary gain but also reveal hidden desires and intimate moments with the city’s cursed inhabitants.

Key Features:

💋 Fantasy Meets Passion: Immerse yourself in a rich, fantasy setting where lustful magic grips an entire city.

💋 Interactive Storyline: Your choices matter. Decide how Dylan interacts with others, which quests to take, and unlock new paths.

💋 Dynamic Quests: Choose tasks that introduce you to intriguing side characters, each with their own secrets and 18+ scenes waiting to be discovered.

💋 Multiple Endings: Your decisions will lead to one of two unique endings—play through the story multiple times to experience both.

💋 Classic Visual Novel Choices: Engage in dialogue options that influence relationships and story outcomes.

💋 Bite-Sized Fun: With an approximate playtime of 1.5-2 hours, it’s perfect for a cozy adult adventure session.

Dare to explore a cursed city filled with lust, adventure, and hard decisions in Cumtown. Will you break the curse… or become part of it?

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages and topics not suited for sensitive audience, such as:
- Female and Male Nudity
- Various animated Sex scenes including anal, blowjob, titsjob, threesome, glory hole, breast milk, fingering, footjob and more.
- Sexually explicit dialogues
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: My Lewd Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Explore the cursed city of Cumtown, where lust and adventure collide. As Dylan, an adventurer, complete tasks, make choices, and unlock steamy 18+ scenes. Can you break the curse or embrace it? Two endings, fantasy, and desire await!
